#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int  N = 2e5 + 10;
char A[N], B[N];

int main() {
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--) {
		cin >> A >> B;
		int len1 = strlen(A); int len2 = strlen(B);

		if(len1-len2 != 1) {
			cout << 0 << endl;
			continue;
		}

		int i;
		for(i=0; i<len2; i++) {
			if(A[i] != B[i])
				break;
		}
		int yes = 1;
		for(i=i+1; i<len1; i++) {
			if(A[i] != B[i-1]) {
				yes = 0;
				break;
			}
		}
		cout << yes << endl;
	}

}
